references.paper_title: Nerf: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces NeRF, a foundational method for novel view synthesis that is heavily used and extended upon in 3D super-resolution research.

references.paper_title: Mip-nerf: A multiscale representation for anti-aliasing neural radiance fields
references.reason: This paper proposes Mip-NeRF, a significant improvement to NeRF, addressing the issue of aliasing that is crucial for high-quality 3D reconstruction.

references.paper_title: 3D Gaussian Splatting for Real-Time Radiance Field Rendering
references.reason: This paper introduces 3D Gaussian Splatting (3DGS), an efficient and widely used method for 3D scene representation that is directly relevant to the 3D super-resolution task.

references.paper_title: Basicvsr: The search for essential components in video super-resolution and beyond
references.reason: This paper introduces BasicVSR, a fundamental model in video super-resolution, which is leveraged in the proposed method to improve consistency in 3D super-resolution.

references.paper_title: NeRF-SR: High quality neural radiance fields using supersampling
references.reason: This paper presents NeRF-SR, a direct precursor to the proposed method, which tackles the 3D super-resolution problem by employing super-sampling techniques.
